mutants.code:
import re

def extract_palindromes(text):
    number_sequences = re.findall('', text)
    palindromic_seqs = [seq for seq in number_sequences if seq == seq[::-1]]
    return palindromic_seqs

mutants.original_line: if seq == seq[::-1]]  # A string equals to its reverse -> it's a palindrome.
mutants.mutated_line: palindromic_seqs = [seq for seq in number_sequences if seq != seq[::-1]]
mutants.code:
import re

def extract_palindromes(text):
    number_sequences = re.findall('\\d+', text)
    palindromic_seqs = [seq for seq in number_sequences if seq != seq[::-1]]
    return palindromic_seqs

mutants.original_line: if seq == seq[::-1]]  # A string equals to its reverse -> it's a palindrome.
mutants.mutated_line: palindromic_seqs = [seq for seq in number_sequences if seq == seq[::+1]]

import re

def extract_palindromes(text):
    number_sequences = re.findall('\\d+', text)
    palindromic_seqs = [seq for seq in number_sequences if seq == seq[::--1]]
    return palindromic_seqs
